original_text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.
korean_text: 그가 우리 족속에게 교활한 방법을 써서 조상들을 괴롭게 하여 그 어린 아이들을 내버려 살지 못하게 하려 할새

sentences.original_text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred
so that they cast out their young children
to the end they might not live
